book.author: Mangano, Sal
book.title: XSLT Cookbook
book.description: An in-depth look at creating applications with XSLT

book.author: Davis, Dee
book.title: Midnight Rain
book.description: A former architect battles corporate zombies, an evil sorceress, and her own childhood to become queen of the world.

book.author: Larrison, Robert
book.title: Oberon's Minor
book.description: The Order of Pendragon, TOP Inc. is on the English military radar and the mysterious agent known only as Oberon helps to create a new life for the inhabitants of London.

book.author: Weeks, Sarah
book.title: Splish Splash!
book.description: A deep sea diver finds true love twenty thousand leagues beneath the sea.

book.author: Kneidel, Sally
book.title: Creepy Crawlies and the Scientific Method
book.description: An anthology of horror stories about roaches, centipedes, scorpions and other insects.

book.author: Milton, John
book.title: Paradise Lost
book.description: one of the greatest epic poems in the English language. It tells the story of the Fall of Man, a tale of immense drama and excitement, of rebellion and treachery.

book.author: Evjen, Bill
book.title: Visual Basic .NET Bible
book.description: Microsoft's Visual Basic .NET initiative is explored in detail in this deep programmer's reference.
